sprints.name: Sprint 3 – EVA Suite Heroes
sprints.goal: Deliver LiveOps, EVA DA and Dev Crew hero demos for the Dec 24 EVA Suite showcase.

agents.name: Planner Agent
agents.role: Breaks down features into executable plans and tasks.

agents.name: Frontend Agent
agents.role: Implements React components, routing and pages.

agents.name: Docs Agent
agents.role: Keeps architecture notes, sprint docs and playbooks up to date.

agents.name: QA Agent
agents.role: Runs checks, catches regressions and suggests fixes.

tasks.title: Build EVA Suite product explorer shell
Add Dev Crew sprint overview dashboard
Document EVA Suite Dec 24 demo scope
Smoke test EVA Suite hero demos

highlights: Core EVA Suite shell is in place.
LiveOps and EVA DA demos are being refined.
Dev Crew dashboard is the last hero piece.
risks: Timebox is tight for polishing all three heroes.
Automation of the AI Dev Orchestrator is not wired yet (demo-only view).
next_steps: Run a mini sprint review to validate narratives.
Prepare groundwork for future automation (AI Dev Orchestrator).

sprints.name: Sprint 4 – Automation First Pass
sprints.goal: Start wiring AI Dev Orchestrator plans to generate code and docs automatically (future work).

highlights: Will focus on automation of EVA Suite work.
Not part of the Dec 24 demo.
